context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Dashboard CRUD for Kitchens, Staff, and Customers is fully functional. Key features verified: 1) Kitchen dialog includes Google Coordinates (lat/lng) fields and Get Current Location button. 2) Staff dialog shows 'Assign to Kitchen' dropdown when role is delivery_boy or kitchen_manager. 3) Customer dialog shows 'Assign to Kitchen (for deliveries)', City dropdown, and Delivery Address input. All data-testid attributes are properly implemented.
